DisplayName: Sound radius magnification
Description: Normal when 1x. When set to 0
Minimum: the radius of sound becomes 0 (SE and SFX are unrelated game-like parameters).

DisplayName: Special effect 0 applied when stepping on hit material
Description: When the character steps on the hit material
Minimum: the set special effect 0 is exhibited.

DisplayName: Special effect applied when stepping on the hit material 1
Description: When the character steps on the hit material
Minimum: the set special effect 1 is exhibited.

DisplayName: Foot effect height type
Description: Height to generate foot effect

DisplayName: Foot effect orientation type
Description: Direction of foot effect

DisplayName: Ground height type
Description: For floating items such as the surface of the water

DisplayName: Is fall damage invalid?
Description: Set to 1 for floors that are not subject to fall damage

DisplayName: Is it a hard material for sound echo?
Description: Is it a hard material for sound echo? (0: soft

DisplayName: Material hardness type
Description: The hardness of the material. Used for soft contact processing of rigid bodies.
